医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
JUNE Medical 的 Galaxy II® 自固式手术牵开器因其高品质和安全性获得 MDR 认证JUNE Medical 自豪地宣布，其 Galaxy II® 自固式手术牵开器已获得 BSI 集团的医疗器械法规（MDR - 法规 (EU) 2017/745）认证，可在欧盟使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/JUNE-Medicale28099s-Galaxy-IIc2ae-self-retaining-surgical-retractor-receives-MDR-certification-for-its-high-quality-and-safety。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/JUNE-Medicale28099s-Galaxy-IIc2ae-self-retaining-surgical-retractor-receives-MDR-certification-for-its-high-quality-and-safety。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3146f643-e963-43fe-863f-3653395a7b8b Thu, 21 Dec 2023 00:08:00 -0500 JUNE Medical’s Galaxy II® self-retaining surgical retractor receives MDR certification for its high quality and safety
蛋白质“开关”控制乳腺癌扩散和免疫治疗反应尽管免疫疗法前景广阔，但它无法治疗许多癌症，包括 80% 以上的一些最晚期乳腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Protein-onoff-switch-controls-breast-cancer-spread-and-immunotherapy-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Protein-onoff-switch-controls-breast-cancer-spread-and-immunotherapy-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=541ace31-3b43-455f-8956-7347294c3c09 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:45:00 -0500 Protein "on/off switch" controls breast cancer spread and immunotherapy response
研究揭示无声打嗝对生活质量和心理健康造成的看不见的影响无法打嗝-；称为逆行环咽功能障碍（R-CPD）——是由于喉咙的环咽肌无法放松以允许气体向外通过而引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-reveals-the-unseen-toll-of-silent-burps-on-quality-of-life-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-reveals-the-unseen-toll-of-silent-burps-on-quality-of-life-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd51370c-7604-4c3e-8b52-85b0a1baa94b Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:42:15 -0500 Study reveals the unseen toll of silent burps on quality of life and mental health
研究将早期失去父母与成人关系中的依恋问题联系起来根据《压力与健康》杂志发表的一项研究，早年失去父母的女性在成年后更有可能经历与伴侣的分离焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-links-early-parental-loss-to-attachment-issues-in-adult-relationships.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-links-early-parental-loss-to-attachment-issues-in-adult-relationships.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=686a6f6e-3e6a-4567-9928-f114bc583584 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:31:18 -0500 Study links early parental loss to attachment issues in adult relationships
较高剂量的外用皮质类固醇会增加骨质疏松和骨折的风险新研究表明，通常用于治疗炎症性皮肤病的外用皮质类固醇剂量较高，与骨质疏松症和骨质疏松症相关骨折的风险升高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Higher-doses-of-topical-corticosteroids-linked-to-increased-risks-of-osteoporosis-and-bone-fractures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Higher-doses-of-topical-corticosteroids-linked-to-increased-risks-of-osteoporosis-and-bone-fractures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3edcc394-f934-4f2e-8087-7499f30d0d29 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:19:00 -0500 Higher doses of topical corticosteroids linked to increased risks of osteoporosis and bone fractures

研究揭示了大脑将经历拼接成记忆的内置机制挪威科技大学卡维利系统神经科学研究所的科学家们发现了大脑中的一种活动模式，可以作为构建连续体验的模板。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-reveals-brains-built-in-mechanism-for-stitching-experiences-into-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Study-reveals-brains-built-in-mechanism-for-stitching-experiences-into-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b574c114-736f-4ab4-919d-e42fd30add57 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:02:23 -0500 Study reveals brain's built-in mechanism for stitching experiences into memories
惠康信托基金会拨款 140 万英镑，揭示怀孕期间的热应激问题伦敦卫生与热带医学院 (LSHTM) 冈比亚医学研究理事会单位 (MRCG) 的研究人员将继续评估极端高温对孕妇及其未出生婴儿的急性和慢性影响背后的机制，作为研究的一部分来自 Wellcome Trust 的 140 万英镑赠款。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Shedding-light-on-heat-stress-during-pregnancy-with-c2a314-million-Wellcome-Trust-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Shedding-light-on-heat-stress-during-pregnancy-with-c2a314-million-Wellcome-Trust-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32e176d3-6503-45e6-a304-d7e2d9238470 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 18:42:46 -0500 Shedding light on heat stress during pregnancy with £1.4 million Wellcome Trust grant
研究揭示了体内细菌与肾结石形成之间的广泛联系劳森健康研究所和西部大学在《微生物组》杂志上发表的一项新研究发现，体内多个部位微生物组的变化与肾结石的形成有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Research-unveils-widespread-link- Between-body-bugs-and-kidney-stone-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/Research-unveils-widespread-link- Between-body-bugs-and-kidney-stone-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=225de816-191f-464a-a6a9-55696a2d91fa Wed, 20 Dec 2023 18:28:34 -0500 Research unveils widespread link between body bugs and kidney stone formation
